title.rendered: “Operation Passover: How Netzach Yehuda Battalion Targeted Terrorist Infrastructure in Beit Hanoun”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Before and during the holiday: ‘Netzach Yehuda’ battalion operated in the Beit Hanoun area to destroy terrorist infrastructure

‘Netzach Yehuda’ Battalion (97) under the command of the Northern Brigade of the Gaza Division, conducted a focused raid before and during Passover, in the Beit Hanoun area to destroy terrorist infrastructure. During the operation, the battalion’s soldiers destroyed several terrorist infrastructures and tunnels in the area.

In the course of the force’s engagement with terrorists, Master Sergeant (res) Salem Alkarishat, may his memory be a blessing, a scout in the Northern Brigade of the Gaza Division, fell.

Earlier today, the commander of the command, Major General Yaron Finkleman, conducted a situation assessment with the forces fighting in the field.

Attached is documentation from the activity of Netzach Yehuda battalion in the Beit Hanoun area: https://bit.ly/3UtvqBf

Attached are photos on the subject: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC7632
